answers.answer: I don't know if my other post went through so here I go again.  I go to an endo at Union Memorial Hospital in Baltimore.  Her name is Dr. Pamela Schroeder.  She specializes in thyroid unlike most who specialize in diabetes.  She does listen and communicates with you.  I have hashimoto -hypothyroid.

question: Greetings.  I am new to this forum and just starting to search for a doctor in Maryland who can listen and treat hypothyroid. Any advice? Thank you.
title: A good thyroid doctor in Maryland?
